events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and filed the initial claim accordingly.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and incident details.
A claims agent was promptly assigned to the case to ensure quick follow-up and support for the customer.
The customer received official acknowledgment of their claim submission via email and phone call.
The agent requested additional documentation including the police report and photos of vehicle damage.
Customer submitted the police report along with detailed photos of the damaged vehicle as requested.
The insurance company began investigation into the accident circumstances and coverage applicability.
Investigation confirmed that the accident was covered under the policy terms with no disputes.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs for the damaged vehicle sustained in the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution and clarity of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved by management based on the investigation and settlement agreement.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customer for the agreed vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was closed successfully following full payment and confirmation of repair completion by the customer.
